sentences.en: Alice wasn't the least bit frightened.
Building society repossessions have frightened buyers off.
sentences.cn: 建屋互助协会收回未偿清房贷的住房，这吓退了很多买家。

sentences.en: Don't be frightened by failure, son.
Don’t be frightened. We’re not going to hurt you.
sentences.cn: 别害怕，我们不会伤害你的。

sentences.en: His heart was pounding, as if he were frightened.
sentences.cn: 他的心怦怦跳，似乎被吓坏了。

sentences.en: In a way, I suppose I'm frightened of failing.
Survivors waited for the rescue boats, dazed and frightened.
sentences.cn: 生还者不知所措，心有余悸，等待着救援船只。

sentences.en: The boy frightened away the pigeons from the roof.
sentences.cn: 那男孩把屋顶上的鸽子吓飞了.

sentences.en: The horse was badly frightened by the sudden noise.
sentences.cn: 那匹马被突然而来的嘈杂声吓坏了.

sentences.en: The lads don't join the union because they're frightened of being victimized.
sentences.cn: 那几个伙计没加入工会是因为害怕成为牺牲品。

sentences.en: The stock market's precipitous drop frightened foreign investors.
sentences.cn: 股票市场的猛跌吓坏了国外投资者。

sentences.en: The sudden noise frightened the birds to take wing.
sentences.cn: 突然的噪声把鸟群惊飞了.

sentences.en: They were frightened of being double-crossed.
Though badly frightened, she remained outwardly composed.
sentences.cn: 她虽然非常害怕，但表面上依然很镇静。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, I was frightened to death (= very frightened ) .
You frightened me to death, staying out all night!
sentences.cn: 你整夜不回家,把我急死了!
